item.description: @Regensbloggerin I generally let unrecognized numbers go to voicemail. DA is always considerate and leaves a message.
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin I generally let unrecognized numbers go to voicemail. DA is always considerate and leaves a message.

item.description: @Regensbloggerin I get (very rarely) 3 kinds of spam calls: fake Microsoft, fake Europol, and Democrats Abroad üòõ

item.description: Tried to get a second booster today, but was turned away as my positive PCR test was just 3 months ago. I‚Äôm to wait another 3 months. I did get a stamp in my vax book (and a QR code) for the positive test.
item.source:markdown: Tried to get a second booster today, but was turned away as my positive PCR test was just 3 months ago. I‚Äôm to wait another 3 months. I did get a stamp in my vax book (and a QR code) for the positive test.
